explains: n. 资本化；资本总额；用大写

sentences.en: The capitalization of constants in the Color class.
sentences.cn: 将color类中的常量变为大写。

sentences.en: Is the index capitalization weighted or price weighted?
sentences.cn: 它是资本加权指数还是价格加权指数？

sentences.en: One of the major reasons for business failure is under-capitalization.
sentences.cn: 很多事业之所以失败主要原因之一就是缺少资金。
